achievement.name: Mythical Defender

achievement.name: Mythical Dungeon Raider

achievement.name: Playin' Cupid

achievement.description: You played matchmaker for the gender mobs on the Sky O' Love challenge, and defeated Mega Cupid... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Transcendent Challenge Champion
achievement.description: You completed every original Challenge on Nightmare Hardcore difficulty. The gods weep before your awesome might!

achievement.name: Eternia Shard Recovered: Blue
achievement.description: You retrieved the Blue Lost Eternia Shard from the scorching sands of Moraggo!

achievement.name: Transcendent Survivalist
achievement.description: You achieved Nightmare Survival Victory on every Campaign mission, and are thus rewarded!

achievement.name: Eternia Shard Recovered: Yellow
achievement.description: You retrieved the Yellow Lost Eternia Shard from the cold waters of Aquanos!

achievement.name: Puzzle Solver

achievement.description: Defeat Calaca with Player 1 playing as Juanita

achievement.name: World Champion
achievement.description: Earn a Gold Medal in all Infierno challenges

achievement.name: Title Contender
achievement.description: Earn a Silver Medal in all Infierno challenges

achievement.name: Heavyweight
achievement.description: Earn a Bronze Medal in all Infierno challenges

achievement.name: GOOOOOOOAL!

achievement.name: Beastly
achievement.description: Complete Infierno challenge 17 as the Alebrije

achievement.name: The Devil wears Revenge!
achievement.description: Defeat Calaca with full health in Diablo's Suit

achievement.name: The Old-Fashioned Way
achievement.description: Complete Infierno challenge 14 using Goat Fly no more than four times

achievement.name: Reserves
achievement.description: Win an online game with at least half your nukes still remaining

achievement.name: Perfectly timed betrayal
achievement.description: Defect from an ally, then land a nuke on one of their cities within 10 seconds

achievement.name: Pre-emptive striker
achievement.description: Destroy a total of 50 enemy silos before they can launch any Nukes

achievement.name: Kill The World
achievement.description: Nuke 7 billion civilians

achievement.name: Wasteful
achievement.description: Destroy a total of 50 enemy ships with Nukes

achievement.name: Nice try
achievement.description: Sink an entire enemy fleet of six subs, before they can launch a single nuke

achievement.name: Hit and run
achievement.description: Launch all nukes from a fleet of six subs and escape without losing a single sub in the process

achievement.name: Recon expert
achievement.description: Uncover all ground bases belonging to a single enemy team before Defcon 1

achievement.name: Brave sacrifice
achievement.description: Lose 500 pilots due to running out of fuel

achievement.name: Explore North America
achievement.description: Nuke Washington DC, New York and San Francisco in a single match

achievement.name: Explore South America
achievement.description: Nuke Mexico, Sao Paolo and Lima in a single match

achievement.name: Explore Europe
achievement.description: Nuke London, Rome and Berlin in a single match

achievement.name: Explore Africa
achievement.description: Nuke Cairo and Kinchasa in a single match

achievement.name: Explore Russia
achievement.description: Nuke Moscow and Leningrad in a single match

achievement.name: Explore Asia
achievement.description: Nuke Tokyo, Shanghai and Hong Kong in a single match

achievement.name: Lone warrior
achievement.description: Win a 6 player game online without ever being in an alliance

achievement.name: Diplomat
achievement.description: Win an online game of Diplomacy

achievement.name: Backstabber
achievement.description: Call a vote and convince your allies to kick a team member, a total of 10 times

achievement.name: Had enough yet?
achievement.description: Nuke a city with a population already reduced to 0.0M

achievement.name: Survivor
achievement.description: Win an online game of Survivor with at least 90% of your population still alive

achievement.name: Merry Christmas
achievement.description: Nuke Santa and thereby end Christmas for everyone, for ever more

achievement.name: Final Destination
achievement.description: Defeat the Last Express.

achievement.name: Veni, Vidi, Vici
achievement.description: Defeat the Conquistador.

achievement.name: P(e)acemaker
achievement.description: Pacify the Heart of Mars.

achievement.name: Whodunnit?
achievement.description: Watch the credits.

achievement.name: The Centurion Card
achievement.description: Purchase all items from the Shoppe.

achievement.name: Trio
achievement.description: Complete a team game with 3 players.

achievement.name: Quartet
achievement.description: Complete a team game with 4 players.

achievement.name: Fearsome Foursome
achievement.description: Complete a team game with 4 players all piloting different ships.

achievement.name: Gauntlet Run
achievement.description: Complete the Gauntlet on any difficulty.

achievement.name: Marathon Run
achievement.description: Complete the Gauntlet on all difficulties.

achievement.name: Suicide Run
achievement.description: Complete the Gauntlet without using Vaunt on any difficulty.

achievement.name: Vauntless
achievement.description: Complete any level without using Vaunt.

achievement.name: Difficult Combo
achievement.description: Sustain a vaunt combo for 45 seconds on Difficult.

achievement.name: Legendary Combo
achievement.description: Sustain a vaunt combo for 60 seconds on Legendary.

achievement.name: Divine Combo
achievement.description: Sustain a vaunt combo for 75 seconds on Divine.

achievement.name: A New Challenger!
achievement.description: Complete a challenge level.

achievement.name: Challenge Milestone 1
achievement.description: Complete 5 challenge levels.

achievement.name: Challenge Milestone 2
achievement.description: Complete 15 challenge levels.

achievement.name: Challenge Milestone 3
achievement.description: Complete all challenge levels.

achievement.name: Godlike Combo
achievement.description: Sustain a vaunt combo for 90 seconds on Judgement.

achievement.name: Story Time!
achievement.description: Read through all the story text in the game.

achievement.name: Trial By Fire
achievement.description: Complete any level on Difficult difficulty.

achievement.name: More Like 'Bullet Heaven'!
achievement.description: Complete any level on Divine difficulty.

achievement.name: Judgement Day
achievement.description: Complete any level on Judgement difficulty.

achievement.name: Unbreakable
achievement.description: Complete the Gauntlet on Divine difficulty.

achievement.name: Indomitable
achievement.description: Complete the Gauntlet on Judgement difficulty.

achievement.name: Won! See? See?
achievement.description: Complete the Gauntlet without continuing.

achievement.name: Perfect Play
achievement.description: Complete the Gauntlet on Judgement difficulty without continuing.

achievement.name: Final Form
achievement.description: Complete the Gauntlet on Judgement difficulty without being hit or continuing.

achievement.name: Super Play
achievement.description: Complete the Gauntlet on Divine difficulty without continuing.

achievement.name: True Form
achievement.description: Complete the Gauntlet on Divine difficulty without being hit or continuing.
